name: xor2
body: |- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))))

stmt.origin: bitri(wxo(w0, w1), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wn(wb(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))))
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))))
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))))

|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))))
-| wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))))

body.origin: |- wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))))

comment: Two ways to express "exclusive or". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.)
